item.description:
Summer to Summer
By Jennifer Jane

a photographic narrative of over 800 images from the
Summers of 2009 to 2010 by Jennifer Jane

Also exhibiting are
JJG Photographic Society Members
Kathy Conway
and
Sven Martson

Opening reception 5-8pm BUT I will be there at 6:00
ABOUT THE GALLERY:
JJG is dedicated to contemporary photographic art that explores diverse cultures, geographical locations and individual experiences. Learn more about this gallery's exhibitions, events, artist talks and educational opportunities on the site.
Jennifer Jane Gallery provides exposure for emerging and professional photographers and their passion for photography. While providing exhibition opportunities for budding artists, we also strive to acquaint artists with processes including digital photography, archival printing and framing, the history of photographic art and noted photographers through educational programming that is open to the public.

The three aims of Jennifer Jane Gallery are to:
Provide exhibition space for photographic artists
Encourage and advise collectors while supporting the arts
Present educational opportunities to artists and enthusiasts alike

Sidewalk Dave
with The Proud Flesh and Amanda Bloom

LIVE @ 8pm
$5 Suggested donation for the bands please

http://www.sidewalkda...

Review - Sidewalk Dave:
"Over the past few years, approximately one zillion young musicians have put their own spin on a fusion of contemporary indie rock and American roots music. It's quite a trick to stand out from that pack. Sidewalk Dave does"
- Fairfield County Weekly (Feb 04, 2010)

ALSO:
We are proud to welcome our neighbors
New England Brewing to our event.
Join us for a beer tasting!!

838 Whalley Avenue Entrance on West Rock Avenue Westville Village New Haven CT
item.name: Summer to Summer Reception & Live Music with Sidewalk Dave
